description: Explore how World of Women is transforming the NFT space with a focus on diversity and inclusivity, now enhanced by their adoption of Arbitrum for scaling and accessibility.
keywords: World of Women, NFTs, Arbitrum, diversity, inclusivity, digital art, blockchain, Layer 2, Yam Karkai, Ethereum, NFT community
title: Embracing Diversity in the Metaverse: World of Women on Arbitrum
